resources.string: This is a full-screen activity that hides the native system Navigation Bar. As a general rule of thumb, you should provide the user an alternative option to navigate, such as a back button, or an \'Exit App\' function.
Click one of the buttons below to navigate to a new screen.
This screen prompts the user to present their card and utilizes the full-screen immersive option (which hides the system Navigation Bar).
This screen overrides the native behavior of the system Navigation Bar Home, Back and Recent Apps buttons.
The native behavior for the Back, Home and Recent Apps buttons has been changed. Click on the system Navigation Bar buttons to see what happens.
On Back Click: I\'m sorry Dave, I\'m afraid I can\'t do that.
On Home / Recent Apps Click: I\'ll be back in just a moment, just watch!
